attributes.action: use the olympic village after the games to house all MP's creating no requirement for expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once the olympics have finished, the olympic village should be used to house all MP's hotel style so that there can be no claims for second homes, and any assocaite costs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
